text: Bjorg Lambrecht (2 April 1997 – 5 August 2019) was a Belgian cyclist. He rode for UCI WorldTeam . In August 2018, he was named in the startlist for the 2018 Vuelta a España. Lambrecht died on 5 August 2019 after crashing into a concrete tunnel during the third stage of the 2019 Tour de Pologne, at age 22. ==References== Category:1997 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths in sport Category:Belgian cyclists Category:Sportspeople from Ghent
title: Bjorg Lambrecht
